title: What can I do PBE account is still not accepted?
body: What can I do desire to let my account was 1 month still no answer? I would appreciate your help :){{champion:1}}

replies.body: I was able to confirm that your application was received, but we can't force or expedite an application.  I don't have any additional details on how applicants are selected beyond what's provided in the [PBE Faq](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ).  Best of luck with your admission to the PBE!
